Texts.Eng:
Demons... What more is there to say, they like fire, and have horns and tails

  Diet: Omnivorous 

^orange;Perks^reset;: 
  Health x^green;1.15^reset;, Defense x^green;1.1^reset;
  Resist: +^green;40^reset;% Shadow, +^green;40^reset;% Fire
  Immune: Heat/Burning

^orange;Environment^reset;: 
  ^green;Hot^reset; biomes:
    Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  ^red;Cold^reset; biomes:
    Health x^red;0.85^reset;, Energy x^red;0.9^reset;

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Shortswords or Daggers: +^green;10^reset;% Crit Damage
  Longsword, Broadsword, or Katana: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Spear: +^green;1.5^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;15^reset;% Crit Damage
  2x Small Blades: Defense x^green;1.12^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Movement Speed


^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
  Resist: -^red;40^reset;% Ice, Cosmic
